mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_department as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDepartmentPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_department as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDepartmentPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_department as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDepartmentPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_department as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDepartmentPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_department as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDepartmentPo.havingClause}
